data.title: Beware statins with macrolides
data.meta_description:
Douglas and colleagues suggest starting a short course of statins when suspected pneumonia is diagnosed.1

Initial empirical treatment for pneumonia often includes macrolide antibiotics, as recommended by British Thoracic Society …
